scripts.build: yarn hardhat clean && yarn hardhat compile

scripts.deploy:baseSepolia: yarn build && yarn hardhat deploy_mainnet --network baseSepolia

scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn build && yarn hardhat deploy_mainnet --network mainnet
